name: Side Effects (elliot-winch)
description:
Side Effects is a potion-making puzzle game. Each Order has a list of desired Properties and their desired Potency. Use the Ingredients to create Potions with the right Properties to fulfil the Order.

Controls

Left click on an ingredient to add it to the potion. Right click same ingredient to remove it from the potion. Press the submit button when you're ready, or the reset button to start again.
